amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit the Bureau of Land Management from finalizing, implementing, administering, or enforcing the Rock Springs Resource Management Plan in Wyoming.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
